definition: to put/to place/to release/to free/to let go/to let out/to set off (fireworks)
lightning/electricity/electric (bound form)/to get (or give) an electric shock/phone call or telegram etc/to send via telephone or telegram etc

sentences.english: The pulse discharge phenomena of gas-liquid mixture in wire-wire gap are studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了气液混合两相体中线线电极脉冲放电现象。

sentences.english: Study on degradation of methyl orange wastewater by high voltage discharge;
sentences.chinese: 用自放电电压的高低来判定电容器的质量。

sentences.english: The most effective air—ion producer is worked by statistic effluvium.
sentences.chinese: 最有效的离子发生器是无声放电式的。

sentences.english: In this case, Discharging termination voltage means 1.0voltage per cell.
sentences.chinese: 中止放电电压规定为每节电池1V。

sentences.english: The discharges of phrenic nerve and the curve of respiration were recorded.
sentences.chinese: 分别记录对照组和模型组大鼠膈神经放电及呼吸曲线。

sentences.english: If you're affluent, you can also put a lemon slice after discharge into the pot boil .
sentences.chinese: 如果你富裕，你也可以把锅后，煮到放电的柠檬片。

sentences.english: In this work, we use the technology of DC arc-discharge to grow carbon nanotubes.
sentences.chinese: 在本论文中，以电弧放电法成长奈米碳管。

sentences.english: But electrical discharges made by fish are easier to study than the electricity in the brain.
sentences.chinese: 但鱼的放电现象比人类大脑中的电更容易研究。

sentences.english: The degradation of Fuchsin acid in aqueous solution by contact glow discharge electrolysis is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究了接触辉光放电等离子体降解水体中的酸性品红。

sentences.english: An on-line monitoring system of ultra-high-frequency (UHF) PD was investigated for transformers in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了变压器局部放电特高频在线监测系统。

sentences.english: Neutrons and X rays are observed using gas-discharge.
sentences.chinese: 使用气体放电法观测到了中子和X射线。

sentences.english: The earthquake light has long been supposed to be a phenomenon of atmospheric discharge.
sentences.chinese: 地震发光常被假设为大气放电现象。

sentences.english: Amorphous silicon films were fabricated with a dc glow discharge system.
sentences.chinese: 本文介绍用直流辉光放电装置制备非晶硅薄膜。

sentences.english: Let stand for a battery, the temperature is too high, the self-discharge of the battery.
sentences.chinese: 电池静置时，温度太高，电池的自放电加剧。

sentences.english: Partial discharge can be used to evaluate insulating condition.
sentences.chinese: 局部放电可以反映设备的尽缘缺陷。

definition: to recharge (a battery)/(fig.) to recharge one's batteries (through leisure)/to update one's skills and knowledge
